startDialog.heading: Welcome to Deb's 60th birthday
startDialog.content: This is a short overview of the route and locations for the day. After our brief presentation you can click on the location markers to see details of the venues with highlighted menu items prices and more! Learn more about the event here.

endDialog.heading: I hope you enjoyed the tour
endDialog.content: Feel free to move about the map and explore! Check out more photos from the event here.
